name: esqlate-lib
description: SQL based functional CRUD - The Libary

scripts.test-schema: parallel -j 1 node ./utils/test-schema.js {} {} ::: ./res/schema-definition.json ::: test/res/definition/*.json && parallel -j 1 node ./utils/test-schema.js {} {} ::: ./res/schema-result.json ::: test/res/result/*.json && parallel -j 1 node ./utils/test-schema.js {} {} ::: ./res/schema-request.json ::: test/res/request/*.json && parallel -j 1 node ./utils/test-schema.js {} {} ::: ./res/schema-request-creation.json ::: test/res/request-creation/*.json
scripts.test: npm run-script test-schema && npm run-script test-code
scripts.build-openapi-docs: npm run-script build-openapi && redoc-cli bundle res/openapi.json
scripts.build: npm run-script build-schema && npm run-script build-dts && npm run-script build-openapi-docs && tslint -p . || true && tsc

author: Matt Forrester <github@speechmarks.com>
